1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.1: The sons of Juda: Phares, Hesron, and Charmi, and Hur, and Sobal.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.2: And Raia the son of Sobal beget Jahath, of whom were born Ahumai, and Laad. These are the families of Sarathi.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.3: And this is the posterity of Etam: Jezrahel, and Jesema, and Jedebos: and the name of their sister was Asalelphuni.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.4: And Phanuel the father of Gedor, and Ezar the father of Hosa, these are the sons of Hur the firstborn of Ephratha the father of Bethlehem.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.5: And Assur the father of Thecua had two wives, Halaa and Naara:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.6: And Naara bore him Ozam, and Hepher, and Themani, and Ahasthari: these are the sons of Naara.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.7: And the sons of Halaa, Sereth, Isaar, and Ethnan.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.8: And Cos begot Anob, and Soboba, the kindred of Aharehel the son of Arum.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.9: And <u>Jabes</u> was more honourable than any of his brethren, and his mother called his name Jabes, saying: Because I bore him with sorrow.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.10: And Jabes called upon the God of Israel, saying: If blessing thou wilt bless me, and wilt enlarge my borders, and thy hand be with me, and thou save me from being oppressed by evil. And God granted him the things he prayed for.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.11: And Caleb the brother of Sua beget Mahir, who was the father of Esthon.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.12: And Esthon beget Bethrapha, and Phesse, and Tehinna father of the city of Naas: these are the men of Recha.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.13: And the sons of Cenez were Othoniel, and Saraia. And the sons of Othoniel, Hathath, and Maonathi.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.14: Maonathi beget Ophra, and Saraia begot Joab the father of the Valley of artificers: for artificers were there.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.15: And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephone, were Hir, and Ela, and Naham. And the sons of Ela: Cenez.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.16: The sons also of Jaleleel: Ziph, and Zipha, Thiria, and Asrael.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.17: And the sons of Esra, Jether, and Mered, and Epher, and Jalon, and he beget Mariam, and Sammai, and Jesba the father of Esthamo.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.18: And his wife Judaia, bore Jared the father of Gedor, and Heber the father of Socho, and Icuthiel the father of Zanoe. And these are the sons of Bethia the daughter of Pharao, whom Mered took to wife.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.19: And the sons of his wife Odaia the sister of Naham the father of Celia, Garmi, and Esthamo, who was of Machathi.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.20: The sons also of Simon, Amnon, and Rinna the son of Hanan, and Thilon. And the sons of Jesi Zoheth, and Benzoheth.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.21: The sons of Sela the son of Juda: Her the father of Lecha, and Laada the father of Maresa, and the families of the house of them that wrought fine linen in the House of oath.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.22: And <u>he that made</u> the sun to stand, and the men of Lying, and Secure, and Burning, who were princes in Moab, and who returned into Lahem. Now these are things of old.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.23: These are the potters, and they dwelt in <u>Plantations, and Hedges</u>, with the king for his works, and they abode there.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.24: The sons of Simeon: Namuel, and Jamin, Jarib, Zara, Saul:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.25: Sellum his son, Mapsam his son, Masma his son.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.26: The sons of Masma: Hamuel his son, Zachur his son, Semei his son.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.27: The sons of Semei were sixteen, and six daughters: but his brethren had not many sons, and the whole kindred could not reach to the sum of the children of Juda.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.28: And they dwelt in Bersabee, and Molada, and Hasarsuhal,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.29: And in Bala, and in Asom, and in Tholad,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.30: And in Bathuel, and in Horma, and in Siceleg,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.31: And in Bethmarchaboth, and in Hasarsusim, and in Bethberai, and in Saarim. These were their cities unto the reign of David.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.32: Their towns also were Etam, and Aen, Remmon, and Thochen, and Asan, five cities.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.33: And all their villages round about these cities as far as Baal. This was their habitation, and the distribution of their dwellings.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.34: And Mosabab and Jemlech, and Josa, the son of Amasias,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.35: And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josabia the son of Saraia, the son of Asiel,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.36: And Elioenai, and Jacoba, and Isuhaia, and Asaia, and Adiel, and Ismiel, and Banaia,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.37: Ziza also the son of Sephei the son of Allon the son of Idaia the son of Semri the son of Samaia.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.38: These were named princes in their kindreds, and in the houses of their families were multiplied exceedingly.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.39: And they went forth to enter into Gador as far as to the east side of the valley, to seek pastures for their flocks.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.40: And they found fat pastures, and very good, and a country spacious, and quiet, and fruitful, in which some of the race of Cham had dwelt before.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.41: And these whose names are written above, came in the days of Ezechias king of Juda: and they beat down their tents, and slew the inhabitants that were found there, and utterly destroyed them unto this day: and they dwelt in their place, because they found there fat pastures.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.42: Some also of the children of Simeon, five hundred men, went into mount Seir, having for their captains Phaltias and Naaria and Raphaia and Oziel the sons of Jesi:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__04.43: And they slew the remnant of the Amalecites, who had been able to escape, and they dwelt there in their stead unto this day.
